short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline Time-based One-Time Password Manager, No Account Required

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1OTP is an offline Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) manager that requires no account setup. It securely manages your OTP codes for easy access and usage.

Features:
- Import/Export: Easily transfer OTP configurations between devices.
- Offline: No internet or account connection required for OTP generation.
- Secure: Ensures safe handling and storage of sensitive OTP data.
- Update/Delete: Manage OTP entries effortlessly with update and delete options.
- Easy Copy: Quickly copy OTP codes for seamless authentication.
